property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Piggy, piggy, piggy, pig! Hard to ride when they get big! So catch yourself a piggy pup, And ride him till the sun comes up!" - Goblin lullaby

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, draw 1d4 random items from the box, choose 1 and add to your hand, then banish the rest. If undefeated, you are dealt 1 Combat damage; choose another character at your location to draw a card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty to defeat this barrier is increased by twice the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any. If undefeated, draw a number of cards equal to your hand size, then bury that number of cards. After you act, stash a number of plunder cards equal to your hand size.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Yummy squid! Salty! Tough! Tasy 'cause they fight so rough. But if squid have goblin grin, Run like hell, he ain't you kin!" - Goblin beachcombing song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Grindylow may not be evaded. The difficulty to defeat the Grindylow is increased by the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, a character at your location must summon and encounter the henchman Riptide Grindylow. If that henchman is defeated, the difficulty of the check to defeat Owlbeartross is increased by 4. If the Owlbeartross is undefeated, shuffle it into a random open location. If defeated, examine your location until you find a non-villain monster; then banish it.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Things go boom when Mogmurch throws, Much more fun than using bows. Sometimes when the boom boom blows Is not my fault - that's how it goes." -Mogmurch's song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 2d6 and the Fire trait to any check. If at least 1 d6 rolled on that check is a 1, you are dealt 1d4-1 fire damage. Discard this card to succeed at your Craft check or to explore your location; each character at your location is dealt 1 Fire damage.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Poog say Zarongel is the best, He help burn things and heal the rest. Zarongel's favor makes Poog blessed, And Poog also stab you with knife if you make fun of how he isn't good at riding animals." -Poog's song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 3 with the Fire trait to a combat check. Bury this card to recharge 1d4 random cards from your discard pile. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Links of steel and shiny metal, Decorate with pointy nettle, Not too pretty, might be shoddy, Helps keep blood in goblin body!" --Goblin smithing song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat or Fire damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; a random character at your location is dealt 1 Combat damage. If you are proficient with heavy armors, bury this card instead of banishing it. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Every beastie has a taste, Whether raw or stewed to paste! If a beastie bites your hide, Climb up top and take a ride!" -Goblin hunting song.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to a check. Discard this card to add 2 dice to a check with the Fire trait, or to a check to defeat or acquire a card with the Animal trait. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: If the top card of the blessing discard pile matches this card, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to any check. Bury this card to choose a card from another character's discard pile and add it to your hand. Discard this card to explore your location. After you play this card, if the top card of the blessings discard pile is Blessing of the Gods, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Biggest, baddest, meanest, best! Crunched more birds than all the rest! Eat them up, get all fat, You the chief, now wear the hat! -- Goblin coronation song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to evade a bane with the Goblin trait. When you defeat a bane with the Goblin trait, you may recharge this card to examine your location deck until you find a weapon, an item, or an armor; add it to your hand and shuffle the location deck.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Peppered oil, up the nose, In with all the snot it goes. When you see a horse's knees, Roast them right with burning sneeze!" Goblin wizarding song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to roll your Arcane or Divine die + 1d12 with the Fire trait. Discard this card to add 1d4 with the Fire trait to a combat check using a weapon. If you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card. If you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card.

property.name: Recharge
property.value: Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 8 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Scurvy dogs done ate my leg, So I got this fancy peg. Pounded nails all through and through, Goblin kick now poisons you!" --Ranzak, goblin pirate

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 2d10. If you would succeed at the check, reroll the dice. You must take the lower result.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Trip the horse, watch him drop, As he whinnies, chop, chop, chop! Don't stop there, 'cause horse is big; When it croaks, dance goblin jig!" - Goblin festival song

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee die + 1d10+1. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If you fail a combat check using this weapon, you may discard this card to ignore the result and reroll the dice. You must take the second result.

property.name: Flavour
property.value:
"Goblins fight and goblins bleed, Ranzak takes what Ranzak needs. Follow orders! Don't give guff! Fight for Ranzak! He needs stuff!
Ranzak wrote this clever verse. Ranzak's smart, so you go first! Come on, pirates! Do your duty! Ranzak's ready for some booty!"
--Ranzak's song

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Weapon: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 Spell: 1 [ ] 2 Armor: 1 [ ] 2 Item: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 [ ] 7 [ ] 8 Ally: 1 [ ] 2 Blessing: 4 [ ] 5

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If there is another character at your location, you may evade a bane; a random other character at your location encounters it instead. Add 1d4 ([ ] +1) ([ ] +3) to your check to acquire a boon. When you acquire a boon on your turn, roll 1d6; on a ([ ] 3,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location. [ ] When you close a location, add a plunder card from the box to your hand. [ ] If another character at your location fails a check to acquire a boon, you may attempt a check to acquire it. [ ] When you recieve plunder cards for successfully completing a scenario, you may banish any 1 of those cards and replace it with another plunder card from the box. [ ] Discard a card from the blessings deck to explore your location.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Strength: d4 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Dexterity: d10 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Disable +1, Stealth +1 Constitution d12 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 [ ] +4 Fortitude +1 Intelligence: d4 Wisdom: d4 [ ]+1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Survival +3 Charisma: d6 [ ] +1 [ ] +2

property.name: Attr4
property.value: [X] Light Armors, [ ] Heavy Armors, [X] Weapons

property.name: Flavour
property.value:
"Goblins fight and goblins bleed, Ranzak takes what Ranzak needs. Follow orders! Don't give guff! Fight for Ranzak! He needs stuff!
Ranzak wrote this clever verse. Ranzak's smart, so you go first! Come on, pirates! Do your duty! Ranzak's ready for some booty!"
--Ranzak's song

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Weapon: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 Spell: 1 [ ] 2 Armor: 1 [ ] 2 Item: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 [ ] 7 [ ] 8 Ally: 1 [ ] 2 Blessing: 4 [ ] 5

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If there is another character at your location, you may evade a bane; a random other character at your location encounters it instead. Add 1d4 ([ ] +1) to your check to acquire a boon. When you acquire a boon on your turn, roll 1d6; on a ([ ] 3,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location. [ ] Recharge a card to add 2d4 to your check to defeat a barrier or a henchman, then discard the top 1d4 cards from your deck. [ ] At the end of your move step, if you are the only character at your location, you may move a random other character to your location. [ ] After you defeat a monster from a location deck, you may examine the top card of that deck; if it's a boon, banish it. [ ] If you defeat a henchman by at least 6, add 1d6 ([ ] 2d6) to your check to close the location, if any.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Strength: d4 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Dexterity: d10 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Disable +1, Stealth +1 Constitution d12 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 [ ] +4 Fortitude +1 Intelligence: d4 Wisdom: d4 [ ]+1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Survival +3 Charisma: d6 [ ] +1 [ ] +2

property.value:
"Goblins fight and goblins bleed, Ranzak takes what Ranzak needs. Follow orders! Don't give guff! Fight for Ranzak! He needs stuff!
Ranzak wrote this clever verse. Ranzak's smart, so you go first! Come on, pirates! Do your duty! Ranzak's ready for some booty!"
--Ranzak's song

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Weapon: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 Spell: 1 [ ] 2 Armor: 1 [ ] 2 Item: 4 [ ] 5 [ ] 6 [ ] 7 [ ] 8 Ally: 1 [ ] 2 Blessing: 4 [ ] 5

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If there is another character at your location, you may evade a bane; a random other character at your location encounters it instead. Add 1d4 ([ ] +1) to your check to acquire a boon. When you acquire a boon on your turn, roll 1d6; on a ([ ] 3,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Strength: d4 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Dexterity: d10 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Disable +1, Stealth +1 Constitution d12 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 [ ] +4 Fortitude +1 Intelligence: d4 Wisdom: d4 [ ]+1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Survival +3 Charisma: d6 [ ] +1 [ ] +2

property.name: Attr4
property.value: [X] Light Armors, [X] Weapons

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 0

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, summon and encounter the henchman Riptide Grindylow.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Instead of your first exploration each turn, you may choose another character at your location and add 1 random card from his discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 0

property.name: Flavour
property.value: If they brings a tasty goat, Peoples welcome on our boat! You can gain the rank of private After teaching us to drive it.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you encounter a card, all other characters at this location move to a random closed location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 6

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character at this location must bury a card.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reduce Structural damage to this ship by 1d4; if you roll a 1, bury a card. If you would fail a combat check by 2 or less, you may discard a card from the blessings deck to succeed.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 6

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Years ago, Captain Lantern discovered the location of a legendary treasure. A recent mutiny led by his wife, Varossa Lantern, has left both this ship and his secret under new ownership

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, roll 1d4; on a 1, bury a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 5

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If any character would discard any cards during the check to defeat the Mistmourn, bury those cards instead.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reduce Structural damage to this ship by 2. You may discard a card from the blessings deck to evade a bane.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 5

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The Mordant Spire elves speak in hushed tones of a dragon ship that ransacked many treasures of lore. Word is that an elven armada sank the beast, but word is often unreliable in the Shackles

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Whenever you banish cards, banish 1 additional card from your hand.
